document.full_text: french authorities said that 75 bodies had been pulled from the atlantic ocean in the past week, nearly two years after the crash of an air france flight from rio de janeiro to paris.
document.title: europe: more bodies recovered from 2009 air france crash
lines_and_colors: french authorities said that 75 bodies had been pulled from the atlantic ocean in the past week, nearly two years after the crash of an air france flight from rio de janeiro to paris.
